DESCRIPTION: As a user I cannot see the unit visualisation when no unit is selected
TEST STEPS:
1. Navigate to Case Management page
2. Ensure Unit filter is set to "All"
3. Observe the area between summary counters and case table
EXPECTED RESULT: No train diagram is displayed. The area between summary counters and case table is empty or shows placeholder content.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see the unit visualisation when I select a specific unit
TEST STEPS:
1. Navigate to Case Management page
2. Select a specific unit from the Unit dropdown (e.g., "150208")
3. Click Apply
4. Observe the area between summary counters and case table
EXPECTED RESULT: Train diagram is displayed showing visual representation of the selected unit. The unit shows carriages with appropriate styling.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see accurate carriage representation for the selected unit
TEST STEPS:
1. Select a 2-car unit from the Unit dropdown
2. Click Apply
3. Observe carriage configuration
4. Select a 3-car unit from the Unit dropdown
5. Click Apply
6. Observe carriage configuration
EXPECTED RESULT: Train diagram displays the correct number and configuration of carriages for the selected unit (e.g., 2-car units show 2 carriages, 3-car units show 3 carriages).

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see subsystem highlighting on the train diagram
TEST STEPS:
1. Select a unit from the Unit dropdown
2. Click Apply
3. Observe the train diagram
EXPECTED RESULT: Highlighted sections are displayed on the train diagram showing different subsystems (e.g., pink/red areas on carriages). The highlighting is always present regardless of alert status.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see the visualisation disappear when I clear the unit filter
TEST STEPS:
1. Select a specific unit from Unit dropdown
2. Click Apply
3. Verify train diagram is displayed
4. Click Clear button
5. Observe the train diagram area
EXPECTED RESULT: Unit filter is reset to "All". Train diagram disappears and is no longer visible.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see the visualisation update when I select a different unit
TEST STEPS:
1. Select a specific unit (e.g., "150208") from Unit dropdown
2. Click Apply
3. Note the train diagram displayed
4. Select a different unit (e.g., "150213") from Unit dropdown
5. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Train diagram updates to show the newly selected unit. Carriage configuration updates to reflect the new unit.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see the visualisation persist when applying other filters
TEST STEPS:
1. Select a unit from Unit dropdown
2. Click Apply
3. Verify train diagram is displayed
4. Select a TOC or Class filter
5. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Train diagram remains visible as long as the unit filter is still set to a specific unit. The diagram continues to show the selected unit even when other filters are applied.
